thread.title: US diet committee calls criticism 'woefully inadequate and factually incorrect'
thread.title_full: US diet committee calls criticism 'woefully inadequate and factually incorrect'

title: US diet committee calls criticism 'woefully inadequate and factually incorrect'
text: US diet committee calls criticism 'woefully inadequate and factually incorrect' Friday, 25 September 2015 (1 minute ago) Earlier this week, the British Medical Journal published an error-laden "investigation" of US Dietary Guidelines Advisory Committee's February report, which informs the new dietary guidelines that the government will release later this year. Because of the journal's prestige, a number of news outlets — including Time, Newsweek, and Mother Jones — reported the story without questioning the faulty reporting. Now, the committee is shooting back.
